nodes.documentation: Auction contract
nodes.name: Auction

nodes.documentation: Notify the current best/highest bid
nodes.name: LogBid

nodes.documentation: Notify when the auction is cancelled
nodes.name: LogAuctionCancelled

nodes.documentation: Notify when funds have been redeemed
nodes.name: LogRedemption

nodes.documentation: @dev Only the beneficiary
nodes.name: onlyBeneficiary

nodes.documentation: @dev Anyone but beneficiary
nodes.name: onlyNotBeneficiary

nodes.documentation: @dev Allow execution only post auction start time
nodes.name: onlyAfterStart

nodes.documentation: @dev Allow execution only prior to auction end time
nodes.name: onlyBeforeEnd

nodes.documentation: @dev The contract has not been cancelled
nodes.name: onlyNotCancelled

nodes.documentation: @dev Only if the beneficiary has not redeemed funds
nodes.name: onlyNotRedeemed

nodes.documentation: @dev Only if past the Auction end time
nodes.name: onlyAuctionClosed

nodes.documentation: @dev Only if past the Auction end time, or the auction was cancelled
nodes.name: onlyAuctionClosedOrCancelled

nodes.documentation: @dev the caller must include some funds
nodes.name: onlyNonZeroFunds

nodes.documentation: @dev the caller must include funds to raise their bid
nodes.name: onlyHasEnoughFunds

nodes.documentation: @dev the caller can beat highest bid
nodes.name: onlyRaisesBid

nodes.documentation:
@dev Cancel the auction
      This will allow the bidders and beneficiary to redeem
      funds.
 Preconditions Who: only the beneficiary
 Preconditions When: auction not cancelled
nodes.name: cancelAuction

nodes.documentation:
@dev Place a bid.
 Preconditions Who: anyone except the beneficiary.
 Preconditions When
        - Auction is not cancelled
        - Current time is after Auction began
        - Current time is before Auction ends
        - sender has funds (> 0)
        - sender has enough funds to match her bid.
        - sender beats the current bid
nodes.name: placeBid

nodes.documentation:
@dev Redeem the highest bid
 Preconditions Who: Only the beneficiary
 Preconditions When
        - Auction is closed.
        - Beneficiary hasn't already redeemed
nodes.name: redeem

nodes.documentation:
@dev Refund your losing bids
 Preconditions Who: anyone not the beneficiary
 Preconditions When
        - Auction is closed or cancelled
nodes.name: refund
